Title: Junior Data Science Consultant
HTML:
Vorresti iniziare la tua carriera professionale in un contesto multinazionale, altamente specializzato ed innovativo?

Stiamo ricercando profili neolaureati con forti competenze analitiche in Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Intelligenza Artificiale (AI) e Generative AI (GenAI), nonché in ricerca operativa. La conoscenza di SQL, Phyton, Matlab o R rappresenta un fattore qualificante, ma non sono richieste competenze prettamente tecniche (sviluppo di codice).

Attività

Partecipazione a progetti consulenziali e collaborazione con team multidisciplinari per ottimizzazione di processi di business;

Analisi e interpretazione di KPI analitici prodotti da motori ML o AI per fornire insights strategici;

Sviluppo di soluzioni innovative per migliorare l’efficienza operativa e la competitività aziendale;

Comunicazione efficace dei risultati delle analisi ai clienti e ai team interni.

Requisiti

Laurea in Data Science, Statistica, Matematica, Ingegneria o discipline affini;

Conoscenza di Machine Learning, Deep Learning, AI, GenAI e ricerca operativa;

Capacità di comprendere e utilizzare i KPI analitici per ottimizzare i processi di business;

Eccellenti capacità di comunicazione;

Attitudine al problem solving;

Capacità di lavorare in team.

Competenze Preferenziali

Conoscenza di strumenti di visualizzazione dei dati (es. Tableau, Power BI);

Capacità di gestione di progetti complessi;

Lingua Inglese.

Sede di Lavoro: Milano (modalità ibrida)

I giovani neolaureati/laureandi potranno valorizzare le proprie conoscenze partecipando a progetti internazionali e nazionali all'interno di un contesto tecnologicamente avanzato e stimolante. Lavoreranno in team strutturati e a contatto con figure senior, in un'ottica di formazione e sviluppo costante.

Come società Global Top Employer abbiamo costruito una Smile Working Company in cui la cura, l’ascolto delle persone, il loro benessere e sviluppo delle competenze sono la nostra priorità.

Crediamo nel talento e nell’evoluzione professionale, supportati da: formazione continua, programmi di apprendimento avanzati e piani di crescita personalizzati.

Facciamo parte di NTT Group, che investe oltre 3,6 miliardi di dollari ogni anno in ricerca e sviluppo per aiutare organizzazioni e società a muoversi con fiducia e sostenibilità verso il futuro digitale.

Siamo presenti in Italia con oltre 6000 dipendenti a Milano, Roma, Torino, Genova, Bologna, Treviso, Pisa, Napoli, Cosenza, Bari e Salerno.

Title: AI Engineer
HTML:
Cosa ti proponiamo

All’interno della divisione ENG DIGITAL per la business line Eng AI&Data siamo alla ricerca di una figura di un AI Engineer per progettualità strategiche nel campo dell’Artificial Intelligence.

Quali saranno le tue attività e responsabilità?

Sarai Responsabile Della Progettazione, Sviluppo e Messa In Produzione Di Soluzioni AI Avanzate, Collaborando Con Il Team Di Data Science Per L’industrializzazione Dei Modelli. Sarai La Figura Chiave Coinvolta Nell’intero Ciclo Di Vita Dei Progetti AI, Garantendo Che Le Soluzioni Siano Scalabili, Efficienti e Allineate Con Le Migliori Pratiche DevOps e MLOps. In Particolare, Ti Occuperai Delle Seguenti Attività

  • Progettare e sviluppare soluzioni AI scalabili e ingegnerizzate per ambienti di produzione;
  • Progettare e sviluppare soluzioni AI;
  • Gestire l'intero ciclo di vita dei progetti AI, dalla fase di ideazione al rilascio in produzione;
  • Implementare pipeline di dati robuste ed efficienti per garantire performance ottimali;
  • Collaborare con il team di Data Science per l'industrializzazione e l'ottimizzazione dei modelli AI;
  • Assicurare la continuità operativa delle soluzioni AI in ambienti cloud e on-premise utilizzando pratiche DevOps/MLOps;
  • Monitorare e ottimizzare le soluzioni AI in produzione, risolvendo eventuali criticità tecniche.

Qualifiche e competenze richieste

Qualifiche Richieste

  • Laurea in Informatica, Ingegneria o un campo equivalente;
  • Almeno 1 anno di esperienza nell'ingegnerizzazione di soluzioni AI complesse, dalla fase di prototipazione alla messa in produzione;
  • Conoscenza delle pratiche DevOps e MLOps, e dei relativi strumenti utilizzati (Jenkins e/o Azure DevOps, ecc.);
  • Esperienza con linguaggi e strumenti di programmazione, in particolare Python e Apache Spark.
  • Competenza negli ambienti cloud, con familiarità in almeno uno dei principali hyperscaler (AWS, Azure, GCP);
  • Esperienza nello sviluppo e gestione di applicazioni basate su microservizi in Python.
  • Conoscenza di Kubernetes e/o Openshift per il deploy e l’orchestrazione di container.
  • Familiarità con piattaforme come Cloudera e/o Databricks.

Competenze Aggiuntive Preferenziali

  • Esperienza con il framework Ray per il calcolo distribuito;
  • Esperienza nello sviluppo di applicazioni Single Page Application (SPA) utilizzando framework come Angular, React e/o Vue.js.

Cosa cerchiamo nelle nostre persone?

  • Ambizione, nel perseguire grandi obiettivi e nell'investire sul miglioramento continuo;
  • Proattività, nell’anticipare e affrontare le sfide con iniziativa;
  • Trasparenza, nel comunicare apertamente e fornire feedback costruttivi;
  • Motivazione a migliorare e a crescere insieme agli altri, manifestando apertura al confronto per favorire la crescita collettiva e il raggiungimento degli obiettivi comuni.

Invia la tua candidatura e raccontaci come puoi fare la differenza. 

SEDI DI INSERIMENTO

Milano | Roma

L’annuncio è rivolto a tutti i candidati, senza distinzione di sesso, nel rispetto del Codice delle pari opportunità di cui al D.Lgs. 198/2006 e ss.mm.ii.

Title: Junior Integration Specialist
Description:
Enabling What’s Next




Who We Are😎

Born in 2004 as Techedge, we have almost 20 years of expertise that enabled us to become what we are today: Avvale!

This path led us to be able to count on over 3,500 employees, present in 12 countries around the world.




What We Do🌱

We help public and private companies to re-design their business models through the development of innovative and sustainable solutions, which have a positive impact not only on our customers but also on the world we live in!




How we do💡

Through circular economy models, made possible thanks to technological innovation.




What you will find 🔍

In Avvale we value our talents and your path with us will be full of:

Flexibility, thanks to our policy you can work remotely in Italy, up to 5 days a week, and in SEE and Switzerland up to 5 months a year;

Training & development as you can participate to training on the job, certifications, foreign languages classes and you will have a yearly budget to buy training courses;

Gender equality & inclusion, the obtaining of Pdr 125 is a proof of Avvale commitment to an inclusive and fair work environment!




Role and responsibilities 🎯

For our Sap Software Engineering & Integration Practice, we are looking for recent graduates and/or undergraduates with a strong passion for the IT world and for innovation, to join the team as Junior Integration Specialist for our Italian Offices in Milan, Turin and Padua. We offer a permanent contract accompanied by a well-defined growth plan.

What does integration mean? It involves designing and implementing integration scenarios between heterogeneous systems to optimize data exchange processes within a company.

Our Integration team connects and enables communication between different operational systems, using technologies such as SAP PI, SAP PO, SAP BTP Integration Suite, Mulesoft, Boomi, and TIBCO




Which opportunities will you have by joining our team?

You will work in a young and dynamic team, supported by senior colleagues;
You will be able to work with cutting-edge technologies, slowly becoming an expert in the field;
You will be able to follow projects for important clients in various sectors, such as Energy, Utility, Fashion, Retail, Insurance, Automotive and Manufacturing.




For all our new hires we have planned a free two-weeks full-time Academy course, which will be held in March 2025: a training program dedicated to our new hires, who are interested in getting to know and deepen their knowledge of the company digitalization processes linked to the Sap Software Engineering & Integration area. At the end of the training you will be immediately assigned to a project, so that you can put into practice the skills you have acquired and begin your professional path in the team.




Required Skills🛹

- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer engineering or STEM degrees;

- Good communication skills;

- Logical/analytical thinking;

- Ability to work in a team;

- Organizational and problem solving skills;

- Good knowledge of the English language;

- Consolidated knowledge of the Italian language.




Come with us💪

Send us your resume and have a look at our website to learn more!

We do not consider applications without CV.

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Data Scientist","**Main Tasks** DSs are expected to perform tasks among the following:* Process and analyse large and complex customer data sets in a big data ecosystem with PySpark.* Build Machine Learning algorithms to address business requests.* Identify new analytics trends to drive the application of specific algorithms in areas as Credit Risk Management, CRM and Fraud Detection.* Report methodology and rationales in technical reports.* Synthetize complex results or processes into simple, clear to be visualized, presentations and communication of findings.* For Senior candidates, coordinate junior colleagues and manage independently the client requests, helping the company to structure and deliver new ideas and proposals. * Collaborate to the realization of Iason’s development projects and research. **Analytical and Technical Requirements** - MSc in Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics, Engineering, Statistics, Data Science.- Organized and outstanding analytical skills.- Advanced knowledge in data pipeline transformation for exploration and investigation.- Advanced knowledge in statistic and modelling; deep understanding of Machine Learning algorithms (Classification, Regression and Clustering), also from a methodological standpoint.- Advanced knowledge in statistic and modelling.- Good Knowledge in Text analytics and Natural Language Processing techniques.- Basic knowledge in Graph analysis.- Advanced knowledge of Python, also Spark and PySpark may be required with good or advanced proficiency.- Basic knowledge of SQL database languages.- Knowledge of at least one of the following frameworks: Sklearn, Keras/Tensorflow or Pytorch.- Business financial knowledge (Bank Products and Processes) is a plus.- Clear understanding of an end-to-end advanced analytics project lifecycle (data exploration, model development, evaluation, deployment).- Team work as well as ability to work independently tight to project deadlines.-- Fluent English.- Ability to write technical documentation

Title: Python Software Engineer
Description:
Permanent position only

WHAT CREAM IS ALL ABOUT?

We could be a Cream Factory, a cooking blog or even a detective agency…but in reality, we are a consulting company in Business & Technology active in large organizations and industry leaders in Banking, Insurance, Telecom, Energy, Pharmaceutical & Transport.




CREAM’S SPECIAL RECIPE:

1/3 of Personal development
1/3 of Collective Intelligence
1/3 of Intrapreneurship




And Bonus ingredient: … Some passionate colleagues




WHAT IS A PYTHON SOFTWARE ENGINEER AT CREAM?

As a Python Software Engineer, embrace your role and work with multidisciplinary teams on challenging projects as:

Reporting tools (finance…)
Web applications
Power calculation
Cloud migrations…




YOUR TASKS :

You define technical specifications
You develop and test new innovative tools
You maintain and support Python libraries with other developers
You coach users through ad-hoc training sessions and code reviews
You provide technological watch to keep up to date on state-of-the-art technologies




HOW DO WE IMAGINE OUR FUTURE CONSULTANT?

You love designing, developing, testing and maintaining applications
You hold a Master’s Degree (civil engineer, software engineering…)
You are used to work with Python (Pandas, Numpy…) and C#
You are fluent in French and English; a good knowledge of Dutch is an asset

Bonus :

You have knowledge of technologies among Angular, Kubernetes, Dockers, Azure, Git…
You have IT Infrastructure knowledge

WHY SHOULD YOU TASTE THE LIME FLAVOUR?




A broad diversity of career options: you’re not stuck in a box
You evolve in a learning environment where you can challenge your knowledge with your colleagues
You grow in a company that is at the leading edge of technology
You have the opportunity to bring new ideas to develop a thriving company
We have values we share, live with, experiment every day




We just hire great people and give them the playing field to become awesome!

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Job Location

Brussels

Job Description

Do you want to belong to one of the most advanced Data Science groups in the industry, developing advanced AI, ML and optimization algorithms, and applying Operations Research techniques?

Do you have passion for technology and desire to learn and grow continuously?

A career in IT Data Science & Analytics at P&G will build your Data Science and Analytics skills, develop your ability to influence and think strategically and will provide you a breadth of experience across multiple internal businesses and type of work (whether you do Analytics for Marketing, Sales, Supply Chain).

As a Data Scientist for the Supply Chain you will belong to an award-winning Analytics / Operations Research community that is global in scope, and operates across P&G’s supply chains.

Find out more about IT at P&G at www.youtube.com/watch?v=1ial3aeA9SE .

Your Contribution To P&g’s Success

Our Data Scientists in IT Data & Analytics at P&G are:


Passionate about Analytics: the ability to mine terabytes of data, develop models and algorithms to derive actionable insights, and then translate those insights into business is important in our work. In this role you will provide consulting services to P&G business units in Europe, India, Middle East and Africa; you will use mathematical modelling, decision analysis and simulation to provide business insights to various aspects of the supply network (supply chain design, inventory modelling, capacity analysis, distribution flow and purchasing analytics). You will get to know a wide variety of supply chains and you will influence multi million-dollar decisions. You will act as primary enthusiast for the power of technology, data, and predictive and prescriptive analysis.
Effective communicators, self-driven and able to drive insights into actions that improve business results. Interpersonal and communication skills are crucial to thrive in a multi-functional leadership team. Your job is to communicate complex data or algorithms into simple conclusions that will empower others to act based on the insights you derive.
Technically Capable: Data Scientists “roll up their sleeves”, using data visualization (Spotfire, Tableau), and analytic tools (R, Python, SAS, JMP, Hive/Impala, etc.) to grasp the business building insights in our mountains of data. You should be adept at applying such technologies for solving ad hoc business problems, innovating on potential future solutions, and working with technology partners to translate your innovations into robust, scaled, analytic solutions.


Job Qualifications

YOU ARE THE RIGHT FIT IF YOU ARE/HAVE:


A Master in a quantitative degree (Operation Research, Statistics, Systems Engineering, Decision Sciences, Computer Science, Applied Math, Economics etc.);
English fluency;
Strong technical & analytical skill (R, SAS, SQL, optimization, simulation, predictive modeling etc);
Great leadership skills, problem solving and priority setting;
Excellent collaboration skills and working comfortably across teams;
have passion to transform how decisions are made through adhoc & scaled application of analytics;
preferably have some experience in CPG (FMCG), supply chain, analytics or consulting; can demonstrate success at deriving insight from data and effectively communicating those insights to drive action.


Your Advantages


A fixed contract, with an attractive compensation package;
Competitive pay, including monthly salary, 13th month at the end of the year as well as an annual variable bonus.
A flexible benefits plan to customize to your personal needs and kilometer allowance/public transport reduction;
Hospitalization plan after 6 months of employment, pension plan, life insurance plan, long term illness insurance and stock purchase plan;
Access to Benefits at work platform: A large benefits platform with employee discounts on renowned shops and online commercial platforms as well as on leisure activities and well-known amusement parks;
Working in an international and inclusive environment, with diverse and supporting colleagues.
Continuous self-development via coaching, trainings and a general Growth Mindset working environment;
A vibrant and modern working environment, supporting employees’ wellbeing:
Subsidized company restaurant;
On-site vibrant Café for breaks and less formal meetings;
On-site fitness room and possibility to join regular group sport activities;
Flexibility in terms of working hours and remote working for a good balance between personal needs and the job to be done.
Employee Assistance Program: free professional counseling services, work-life resources, and mental health support.
Supporting employees’ commute: plenty of parking facilities for both cars and bikes, shower facilities, shuttle between Heizel metro and the office, carpooling community.


ARE YOU EXCITED ABOUT THE ROLE? DEEP DIVE INTO P&G AND CHECK THE BELOW INSIGHTFUL LINKS:


Our hiring process consists of three main steps: 1) application, 2) online assessments and 3) interviews. Click here to get all the tips to be fully prepared.
P&G is driven to make life better, not just within the company, but across the globe. Click here to check out how we make a meaningful impact on the world.
We are the world’s largest consumer goods company. Click here to discover about our iconic brands.


At P&G #weseeequal

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. At P&G, we strive to build a culture where everyone feels welcome, included, and able to bring their full selves to work.

We ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process. Please click here if you require an accommodation during the application process. Please make sure to wait to hear back from us regarding your accommodation before proceeding with the online assessment, we thank you in advance for your patience.

Title: ML Engineer
Description:
Department

At Sappi, our Digital Transformation team thrives on tackling business challenges by harnessing the power of analytics, AI, and user-centric design. Driven by a passionate group of data and analytics experts, we optimise processes, uncover valuable insights, and empower proactive decision-making to drive success. Join us as we innovate and transform the future

Role and Responsibilities

In this role you will report to the Head of Data Analytics (based in Brussels).

You will be responsible for:

Collaborating with various teams to analyze key business problems and develop innovative ML solutions, continuously delivering valuable output.
Designing and implementing scalable machine learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) solutions into daily operations.
Establishing testing, monitoring and continuous improvement of ML processes.
Making relevant, detailed, well-structured data available for analytics
Applying data science best practices focusing on data preprocessing, feature engineering and model evaluation. Enable rapid prototyping and evaluation.

Required Qualifications

Experience developing and optimizing scalable machine learning solutions on cloud platforms (e.g., GCP, Azure, AWS).
Strong expertise in ML operations and coding with Python; knowledge of SQL is a plus.
Excellent collaboration and communication skills, adaptable to both technical and business audiences.
Intellectual curiosity and a degree in a relevant field (e.g., computer science, statistics, mathematics, engineering).
Fluent in English.

Traveling:

It is expected to have some traveling (up to 10%) to the locations of group.

What we offer:

An excellent opportunity to work, learn & grow with us. With our culture of learning & development, you can access thousands of online trainings
A multi-cultural & international environment to share and collaborate with colleagues from more than 68 nationalities in 31 locations globally.
A unique opportunity to join a global wood fibre solution company. We are constantly innovating toward a circular economy working to achieve our sustainability goals & reduce our carbon foot print.
Friendly atmosphere and team-work oriented culture
Work-life balance
Training opportunities

All qualified applicants will be considered for employment, regardless of their race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, pregnancy, neurodiversity, disability, or any other aspect that makes them unique.

Title: Data Scientist AI
Description:
Mission context




The Tribe AI’s objective is to leverage data science use cases to create value for the bank. The use cases can come from any department of the Bank, for instance: Robotics, Compliance, Client service center,Marketing, Sales, ...

We are looking for an external consultant who can help us to use new generative AI tools like ChatGPT and Microsoft Office CoPilot to improve our employee productivity and efficiency in our standard activities. The consultant will work with different business users from different parts of the bank, such as marketing, sales, and back office, and with different profiles, such as managers, project managers, sales people, etc.




Function description




Design and create the prompts that can elicit the best responses from the generative AI tools, using prompt engineering techniques and best practices
Understand the business needs: Identify the use cases, the business need and scenarios where our generative AI tools can add value and solve problems
Test and evaluate the quality and accuracy of the generative AI tools' outputs, using appropriate metrics and feedback mechanisms
Train and coach the business users on how to use the
generative AI tools e􀆯ectively and responsibly and begin to set in place a prompt academy
Document and communicate the results and learnings of the project




Language requirements




Dutch Fluent
French Fluent
English Fluent




Education

You have at least a Master’s degree in a quantitative discipline, such as statistics, mathematics, engineering (a PhD is considered an advantage) or MBA.
Candidates with other academic backgrounds with substantial knowledge of prompt engineering technics are also encouraged to apply.




Required experience/ knowledge

You have at least 3 years of relevant experience in Data Science and

Analytics.




Technical experience




Deep knowledge of generative AI tools, such as ChatGPT, Mistral, Llama, etc and Microsoft Office CoPilot, and their underlying principles of large language models
Strong experience in advanced prompt engineering, including designing, creating, testing, and optimizing prompts for different tasks and domains
Microsoft Office Copilot + Copilot ChatGPT, Gemini, ...




Business experience




Business understanding and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to translate business requirements into technical solutions and vice versa
Communication skills, both oral and written, with the ability to explain complex concepts and results in a clear and concise manner
Language skills, with fluency in French, Dutch, and English preferable Financial sector




Soft skills

Team player
Quick self-starter, pro-active attitude
Good Communication and Influencing skills
Good analytical and synthesis skills
Autonomy, commitment and perseverance
Ability to work in a dynamic and multi-cultural environment
Thinks out of the box outside existing processes and frameworks.
Works with energy and empowerment to deliver great results and a large contribution to the company’s success
Constructive by being open to the changes and to other’s opinions, ideas and feedback

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
Freelance Data Scientist (Financial Sector) – Brussels (Hybrid, 12 Months)

Overview

We are seeking an experienced Freelance Data Scientist to support our financial analytics and machine learning initiatives in Brussels. This is a 12-month contract with the potential for extension. The ideal candidate will apply data science, AI, and predictive modeling to enhance financial decision-making, risk assessment, and customer insights.




Key Responsibilities

Develop and implement machine learning models for financial forecasting, risk analysis, and fraud detection.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) on large financial datasets to extract meaningful insights.
Work with structured and unstructured data from multiple sources, ensuring quality and consistency.
Build and optimize predictive models, including time-series forecasting, credit scoring, and anomaly detection.
Automate data pipelines and improve data workflows for real-time analytics.
Collaborate with finance, risk, compliance, and IT teams to align data science initiatives with business goals.
Create clear visualizations and reports to communicate findings to stakeholders.
Ensure data privacy, security, and compliance with financial regulations (Basel III, IFRS, MiFID II).




Required Skills & Qualifications

Technical Skills

Strong proficiency in Python or R for data science and machine learning.
Experience with machine learning frameworks (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, PyTorch).
Strong understanding of financial statistics, risk modeling, and time-series analysis.
Hands-on experience with SQL and relational databases.
Knowledge of Big Data technologies (Spark, Hadoop) and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure) is a plus.
Familiarity with MLOps practices for deploying and monitoring ML models.

Soft Skills

Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking.
Ability to communicate complex findings to non-technical stakeholders.
Self-motivated and able to work independently and in cross-functional teams.
Attention to detail, especially regarding financial data accuracy.

Preferred Experience

Previous experience in the financial sector (banking, insurance, fintech).
Knowledge of financial regulations (Basel III, IFRS, MiFID II).
Experience in credit risk modeling, fraud detection, and algorithmic trading.




Contract Details

Location: Brussels (Hybrid – On-site & Remote)
Duration: 12 months (with possibility of extension)
Type: Freelance Contract
Start Date: ASAP
Compensation: Competitive, based on experience




If you are interested, feel free to apply with your CV or email me directly at adam@kodastaff.com

Title: Data Scientist _FR
Description:
Comment pouvez-vous faire la différence ?

En tant que Senior Data Scientist au sein de notre Direction Customer Services, vous jouez un rôle clé dans l’analyse de nos bases de données afin de définir la stratégie commerciale pour le clients B2B et B2C de la SNCB, tant au niveau national qu’international. Vous rejoignez le département Customer Data, responsable de l'analyse des données clients, de l'automatisation du marketing et de la gestion des données clients.

Quel est votre rôle à la SNCB ?

Au sein du département Customer Data, vous serez responsable de l'analyse d'ensembles de données volumineux et complexes, du développement de modèles prédictifs et de la fourniture d'informations qui soutiennent les décisions stratégiques de la SNCB.

En tant que Data Scientist:


Vous développez de nouveaux modèles stratégiques et marketing et améliorer les modèles existants (ex: modèle de prospection pour le segment B2B pour les Account Managers).
Vous analysez et interprétez les données des voyageurs pour fournir des informations stratégiques à certains Head of d’autres départements.
Vous développez des visuels et des rapports dans des outils tels que Power BI pour présenter les résultats de manière claire, syntétique, accessible et convainquante.
Vous effectuez des analyses de données géographiques et spatiales et vous soutenez les analyses de transport.
Vous collaborez de manière transversale au sein de l'entreprise. Vous agissez en tant que conseiller et personne de confiance en matière de données clients.


Un job fait pour vous ?


Vous êtes titulaire d'un diplôme de master (ou équivalent par expérience) dans une orientation pertinente (par exemple, analyse de données, statistiques, géographie, économie, ingénieur civil, ... ) ET vous disposez ’au moins 3 ans d’expérience comme Data Analyst.


Vous vous reconnaissez dans les compétences suivantes:


Vous maîtrisez les techniques d'analyse mutlivariables et avez de l'expérience dans la gestion et l'analyse de données géographiques.
Vous êtes capable d'utiliser des outils de visualisation et d'analyse de données tels que Power BI et PySpark.
En tant qu’excellent communicateur, vous savez expliquer clairement et efficacement des idées complexes à différents interlocuteurs.
Vous pouvez diriger des projets techniquement complexes et coacher vos collègues pour atteindre les objectifs fixés.
Vous êtes capable de résoudre des problèmes de manière creative et dans la collaboration avec des équipes transversales au sein de la SNCB.
Vous vous adaptez facilement aux besoins du projet et aux attentes des parties prenantes internes.
Vous comprenez une conversation en néerlandais.


Chaque personne est unique. Il est important pour nous que vous puissiez être vous-même. C’est ce qui rend la SNCB plus forte. C’est pourquoi nous accordons beaucoup d’importance à la diversité et à l’inclusion.

Qu'avons-nous à vous offrir ?

En tant que Senior Data Scientist, vous choisissez un job qui a un impact sur la stratégie commerciale de la SNCB. Vous vous trouverez dans un environnement de travail agréable, avec une pertinence sociétale et vous êtes entouré de collègues motivés et sympathiques.

En outre, vous pouvez compter sur :


Un salaire attractif complété d'un 13e mois, d'une indemnité de frais, des chèques-repas et d'un bonus collectif et individuel.
Une partie du salaire est offerte sous forme de budget flexible. Vous pouvez opter pour la location d'un vélo, d’une voiture flex, pour le remboursement de l'épargne-pension, etc.
Une assurance hospitalisation et collective.
Un horaire flexible, un bon équilibre entre vie professionnelle et vie privée grâce à 33 jours de congés par an.
Un abonnement de train en Belgique, des avantages sur les lignes internationales et une indemnité vélo.
Des avantages pour votre famille comme des réductions sur les sorties en famille et dans les magasins.


Où allez-vous travailler ?

Vous travaillez à Bruxelles dans la Direction Customer Services, à proximité de la gare de Bruxelles-Midi et à domicile. Vous rejoignez l’équipe Customer Data composée de 8 personnes.

What’s next ?


Vous postulez sur notre jobsite
Nous analysons votre CV et votre motivation.
Nous vous invitons à un entretien de sélection (en ligne). Afin de préparer cet entretien, nous vous demanderons de compléter un questionnaire de personnalité et un test de raisonnement en ligne.
Dans un second temps, et afin de vous donner une bonne idée de la fonction, nous vous soumettrons un case study éliminatoire.
Si le case study est concluant, un deuxième entretien sera organisé si nécessaire.
Tout se déroule de manière positive ? Nous vous faisons une proposition de contrat.
Vous êtes prêt·e pour votre premier jour de travail !


Avez-vous encore des questions?

Jobreq: 50260

Sur le contenu de la fonction

Lander Bijnens

Lander.bijnens@sncb.be

Sur la procédure de sélection :

Anne-Sophie Heyvaert

Annesophie.heyvaert@sncb.be

+32 499 06 55 75

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
The mission of Predictive Analytics team within Marketing and Communication department is to develop, deploy and support usage of AI models to increase the reach and relevance of the campaigns.




As ML Engineer you will manage the data science ecosystem of the team to build and run our models (Domino Data Science Platform), setup data preparation pipelines, assure and monitor the quality of data sources used to generate indicators, run and monitor the performance of the models.




Function description

The Predictive Analytics team is looking for a Machine Learning (DevOps) Engineer with a proven track record on developing and deploying data science models in python environment as well as experience in data engineering.




You are part of data science team and will work on the following:




Manage the execution and quality assurance of the monthly production run from data preparation, scoring and validation of different AI models and analytical indicators. Improve the automation of this process to make it more efficient
Maintain and improve the existing python programs for collecting and validating data from different sources, for building, scoring, and performance monitoring of AI models of the team (e.g. python version upgrades)
Interface between data scientists and IT to support the usage of the Domino Data Science Platform, the AI building blocks and the evolution of the python environment.
Assist data scientist by helping them identify and install the correct dependencies in their environment, best practices for code quality, continuous improvement and automation
Support the creation of new variables (data engineering), automatic refit of the data science models
Explore new ways of combining the available tools of the bank (AI building blocks from Tribe AI) to unlock new capabilities for building AI products and supporting the data scientists.
Work with a team of motivated data scientists who are eager to learn, collaborate and share expertise.




Telework

50% on-site, 50% telework




Language requirements

English

You have fluent knowledge of English (spoken and written)

Dutch/French

Fluent/Good level of Dutch (French is a plus)

Education

You have a degree in a quantitative field (e.g Master in computer sciences)

Candidates with other academic backgrounds with substantial experience in data science, ML DevOps are also encouraged to apply.




Required experience / knowledge

You have at least 3 years of relevant experience.




Mandatory

Strong expertise in software development in Python and Python data science packages (pandas, sklearn)
Git
bash
SQL
Experience in MLOps / DevOps




preferable

SAS
Domino Data Science Platform
Django
software testing
experience in containerization (docker)
experience in Cloud environments




Business experience

preferable

Marketing and communication




Soft skills

Team player, good communication and presentation skills
Quick self-starter, pro-active attitude
Result driven
Analytical and problem solving mindset
Autonomy, commitment and perseverance
Passionate about continuous improvement

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
CV Submission deadline: 28/02/2025

Location: Belgium, Near- Site




VASS is actively looking for a Data Scientist expert in AI & NLP and with some Business Analysis background to work for our client the European Commission remotely from Belgium.




DESCRIPTION OF THE TASKS




Following tasks will be performed by external service provider:

• Collect business requirement and analyse advanced AI solutions or identify and assess relevant existing data mining, machine learning and business intelligence solution

• Specification and design of presentation interfaces with optimal usability/user experience

• Produces data models according to specific problems statements.

• Contribute to the design and implementation of the analytics architecture and its solution stack (including performance aspects, physical design, capacity dimensions etc…)

• Write the different documentation associated with the tasks and liaise with other project teams as necessary to address cross-project interdependencies.

• Interact with data stewards and other IT stakeholders to define the data rules;

• Define data controls and implement actions to ensure data quality and integrity;

• Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance;

• Data mining using state-of-the-art methods;

• Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis

• Participate in the design of the IT architecture for solutions in the NLP / ML / AI fields, and coordinate its implementation considering master- and meta-data management concepts;

• Analyse data architecture for consistency, completeness, accuracy and reasonableness;

• Contributing for the analysis of data management vision, strategy and policy and derive the IT requirements;

• Analysis of Business requirements.

• Documentation of Business requirements.

• Business model analysis.

• Business process analysis.

• Business processes modelling

• Functional requirements and business cases analysis.

• Risk analysis.

• Assistance in Business cases, Vision documents, Project Charters and Security Plans.




KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS




Following skills and knowledge are required for the performance of the above listed tasks:




• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration or related field.

• At least 13 years of work experience gained after studies.

• Good knowledge of natural language processing systems lifecycle and agile software development methodologies.

• Experience in the field of corpus-based linguistics.

• Experience with alignment models and classification methods.

• Experience with data analytics over big datasets, non-structured databases as well as data lakes.

• Good knowledge of information systems matters.

• Good knowledge of large organisation administrative business processes.

• Good knowledge of analysis/modelling tools and techniques (use case diagram, state diagram, entity relationship model, interaction diagrams etc.).

• Good knowledge of BPMN or UML or other with equivalent value.

• Good knowledge of Wiki and collaborative sites.

• Knowledge of software development methodologies (e.g., RUP, Agile).

• Excellent knowledge of Data Analytics techniques and tools.

• Experience in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing.

• Experience with languages like R, Python, PERL.

• Good knowledge of business intelligence tools (Tableau, Qlik, SAS, SAP, GoodData…)

• Expertise in the ETL processes and tools (SAS, Talend Open Studio…)

• Good knowledge of SQL tooling (NoSQL DB, MongoDB, Hadoop, SQL) • Knowledge of architectural design and implementation of scalable modern data stores.




SPECIFIC EXPERTISE




• Excellent knowledge of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, Neural Network, and/or artificial intelligence frameworks.

• Knowledge of Large Language Models.

• Knowledge in one of the following areas: predictive (forecasting, recommendation), prescriptive (simulation), sentiment analysis, topic detection, social media crawling and processing, plagiarism detection, trends/anomalies detection in datasets, recommendation systems

• Knowledge of Graph Databases.




If you are interested, please don't hesitate to submit your application before the deadline.

Show more

• Write the different documentation associated with the tasks and liaise with other project teams as necessary to address cross-project interdependencies.

• Interact with data stewards and other IT stakeholders to define the data rules;

• Define data controls and implement actions to ensure data quality and integrity;

• Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance;

• Data mining using state-of-the-art methods;

• Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis

• Participate in the design of the IT architecture for solutions in the NLP / ML / AI fields, and coordinate its implementation considering master- and meta-data management concepts;

• Analyse data architecture for consistency, completeness, accuracy and reasonableness;

• Contributing for the analysis of data management vision, strategy and policy and derive the IT requirements;

• Analysis of Business requirements.

• Documentation of Business requirements.

• Business model analysis.

• Business process analysis.

• Business processes modelling

• Functional requirements and business cases analysis.

• Risk analysis.

• Assistance in Business cases, Vision documents, Project Charters and Security Plans.


KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS


Following skills and knowledge are required for the performance of the above listed tasks:


• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Business Administration or related field.

• At least 13 years of work experience gained after studies.

• Good knowledge of natural language processing systems lifecycle and agile software development methodologies.

• Experience in the field of corpus-based linguistics.

• Experience with alignment models and classification methods.

• Experience with data analytics over big datasets, non-structured databases as well as data lakes.

• Good knowledge of information systems matters.

• Good knowledge of large organisation administrative business processes.

• Good knowledge of analysis/modelling tools and techniques (use case diagram, state diagram, entity relationship model, interaction diagrams etc.).

• Good knowledge of BPMN or UML or other with equivalent value.

• Good knowledge of Wiki and collaborative sites.

• Knowledge of software development methodologies (e.g., RUP, Agile).

• Excellent knowledge of Data Analytics techniques and tools.

• Experience in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing.

• Experience with languages like R, Python, PERL.

• Good knowledge of business intelligence tools (Tableau, Qlik, SAS, SAP, GoodData…)

• Expertise in the ETL processes and tools (SAS, Talend Open Studio…)

• Good knowledge of SQL tooling (NoSQL DB, MongoDB, Hadoop, SQL) • Knowledge of architectural design and implementation of scalable modern data stores.


SPECIFIC EXPERTISE


• Excellent knowledge of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, Neural Network, and/or artificial intelligence frameworks.

• Knowledge of Large Language Models.

• Knowledge in one of the following areas: predictive (forecasting, recommendation), prescriptive (simulation), sentiment analysis, topic detection, social media crawling and processing, plagiarism detection, trends/anomalies detection in datasets, recommendation systems

• Knowledge of Graph Databases.


If you are interested, please don't hesitate to submit your application before the deadline.

Title: ML Engineer - Gen AI
Description:
Are you a passionate Machine Learning Engineer with expertise in generative AI?

In this role, you will collaborate closely with data scientists and engineers from our Cloud and DevSecOps teams to implement best practices and ensure technical excellence across multiple projects. Utilizing open-source frameworks like LangChain and Azure-based tools, including the Azure AI Services suite, you will maintain and expand our repository of AI assets. Your innovative mindset will help identify and develop state-of-the-art solutions that deliver business value, while your commitment to staying current with AI advancements will ensure our team remains at the forefront of technology.

As a member of the Machine Learning Enablers team, you will actively research and develop agent-based AI use cases, focusing on multi-agent systems. Your work will support the day-to-day needs of our data scientists through the practical maintenance and enhancement of AI assets, while also driving innovation in our AI initiatives.

Responsibilities

Develop and Maintain our Generative AI Repository


Manage and expand our repository of reusable Generative AI components on Azure DevOps, ensuring it’s robust, up-to-date, and user-friendly, and implements MLOps standards.
Collaborate with data scientists to identify new components to build, provide technical support, and promote best practices in using the repository.


Develop and Implement Agent-Based AI Solutions


Research and experiment with multi-agent systems and emerging frameworks to address real-world use cases in Proximus’ context.
Develop proof-of-concept projects to validate innovative multi-agent AI applications.
Design and create reusable components that enable data scientists to integrate agent-based approaches into their projects.


Collaborate and Drive Technical Excellence


Implement and promote machine learning best practices (e.g., MLFlow), ensuring high-quality standards across the team.
Stay current with the latest trends, models, and frameworks, and communicate them to the team.


Education


Master’s degree in Artificial Intelligence, Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related quantitative field.
A Ph.D. is a plus, especially with research in Generative AI or agent-based systems.


Professional Experience


Minimum of 2 years of relevant work experience in a business environment.
Proven experience working with generative AI models and LLMs in real-world projects.
Demonstrated ability to develop proof-of-concept projects, and transition innovative solutions to production-ready components.
Strong collaboration and communication skills, with experience working alongside a diverse team of technical and non-technical stakeholders.


Technical Skills


Strong coding skills in Python, with proficiency in software development best practices, including version control (e.g., Git) and DevOps (e.g., CI/CD pipelines).
Hands-on experience implementing MLOps best practices (e.g., experiment tracking with MLFlow).
Experience with Microsoft Azure and Azure AI Services.
Experience with LangChain and other Generative AI frameworks.
Ability to drive innovation by experimenting with new techniques and frameworks to solve real-world problems.
Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architectures and improvement techniques.
Strong communication skills for providing technical support, mentorship, and clear guidance to team members.
Strong collaboration skills and ability to manage tasks independently.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills with keen attention to detail.
Experience contributing to the development of reusable AI components or libraries, contributions to open-source AI projects is an asset.
Experience with multi-agent systems and related frameworks (e.g. LangGraph, CrewAI, AutoGen).
Familiarity with monitoring and evaluation tools for generative AI applications.


Languages


Fluent in English and preferably also French and/or Dutch.
Show more

Title: Data Scientist
HTML:
As an Data Scientist, you will play a key role in developing end-to-end solutions for AI use cases. By taking up a use case right from the start you will help business define and scope the problem, pick the right ML solution and technology as well as ensure implementation, integration and deployment of your solution to production. You will do so while ensuring that our internal governance processes and best practices are respected. You will also collaborate with other team members in knowledge sharing as well as continuously improving our way of working.

Responsibilities

  • Develop AI applications using state-of-the-art (Gen)AI technology;
  • Translate business requests into AI applications;
  • Identify high-value use cases through data exploration and visualization;
  • Pilot prototypes in production processes to demonstrate their value;
  • Deploy prototypes to production, with support of IT, to obtain reliable, scalable systems;
  • Present your results in a clear manner and discuss them with multi-functional project teams;
  • Work in close collaboration with business experts (e.g. for requirement gathering, data source identification, data and process understanding, feature engineering, result validation, etc.), with IT (e.g. for ETL, deployment to production, etc.) and with other AI engineers in the team (e.g. for knowledge sharing).

Profile

  • PhD or Master's degree in a quantitative field (Artificial Intelligence, Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, etc.)
  • 3+ years of relevant work experience in a business environment

Technical Skills

  • Hands-on experience with Python and its AI ecosystem;
  • Strong knowledge of state-of-the-art AI and statistical methods;
  • Experience with cloud technology (Azure);
  • Experience using LLM’s and commonly used libraries to interact with LLM’s (Langchain, Llamaindex, ...) is an asset;
  • Proven proficiency in the end-to-end AI project life cycle, including:
  • Translating business requests into data requirements.
  • Identifying high-value use cases through data exploration and visualization.
  • Developing AI solutions (incl. feature engineering, model fitting, etc.).
  • Deploying scalable AI applications to production.
  • Any experience with following elements is a plus:
  • MLOps practices, e.g. orchestration with Airflow, Gitlab CI/CD, etc.

Attitudes/Behavior

  • Passionate about AI and a constant learner;
  • Result-oriented and highly proficient in transforming data into actionable insights that create business value;
  • Team player with strong communication and presentation skills;
  • Able to manage AI projects in an autonomous way and drive collaboration with domain experts, data engineers and other AI engineers;
  • Knowledge in the field of telecommunications is a plus.

Languages

  • Fluent in Dutch and/or French (mandatory) + Fluent in English.

Title: Python Developer
Description:
Are you interested in working in Semiconductor & Electronics? We’re VeroTech, a Belgian engineering consultancy company specialized in R&D projects, currently looking for talented engineers.




Your mission

As a Python Software Engineer, you play a crucial role in developing and maintaining Python-based software solutions to automate experimental measurements, integrate instruments, and enable efficient data handling.




Your main responsibilities include:

Develop and enhance Python software to automate measurement systems.
Integrate new instruments and communication protocols such as GPIB, USB, RS232, and Ethernet.
Diagnose and resolve real-time data acquisition and instrument communication problems.
Create automated workflows for scheduling experiments, collecting data, and processing results.
Optimize Python scripts for efficient handling of large datasets.
Automate data quality control processes to ensure accurate and dependable results.




Your profile

Very proficient in Python, with extensive experience in system automation, instrument control, and backend development.
Practical experience interfacing with lab instruments using protocols like GPIB, RS232, USB, and Ethernet.
Expertise in developing Python-based automation frameworks for data processing and measurement.
Knowledge of database management, especially with Azure cloud databases and optimizing queries.
Proficient in using Git for version control and collaborating within development teams.
Bonus: Experience with AI-based data validation and predictive analytics.




Why join VeroTech?

A motivating salary package, with the possibility of working from home, a company car and other benefits.
Improve your skillset within challenging mid to long-term R&D projects in a variety of high tech industries
Work in a people-oriented company where you will get to guide your own professional career, supported by our internal team.
Join an inspiring community of engineers with a range in expertise and experience levels

Show more

Title: Data Scientist Prompt
Description:
Expanding steadily since its launch in 2003, the ACENSI group is an IT consultancy firm, well known for theirtechnical and functional know-how, who specialize in Telecommunications, Financial Markets, as well as in the Energy industry.

ACENSI guides businesses in evolutionary IT projects from the initial strategies through to their realization (Project Management, Business Define, Design, Implementation and Infrastructure). From its original focus on technical engineering and Business Analysis, ACENSI has developed new areas of expertise in Digital Application,Business Intelligence, Big Data...




ACENSI BELGIUM is looking for his client a Data Scientist Prompt(F/M/X)




Key Responsibilities

Prompt Engineering:

Design and create prompts to elicit optimal responses from generative AI tools using best practices and techniques.

Business Analysis:

Identify business needs, use cases, and scenarios where generative AI tools can add value and solve problems.

Evaluation & Testing:

Assess the quality and accuracy of generative AI outputs using appropriate metrics and feedback mechanisms.

Training & Coaching:

Educate business users on effective and responsible use of generative AI tools and establish a structured “Prompt Academy.”

Documentation & Communication:

Record findings, results, and key learnings to support continuousimprovement and knowledge sharing.




Qualifications & Skills:

Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience
Master’s degree in a quantitative discipline (Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering) or an MBA. A PhD is an advantage.
Candidates with other academic backgrounds but substantial knowledge of prompt engineering techniques are also encouraged to apply.
Minimum of 3 years of relevant experience in Data Science and Analytics.

Language Requirements

French: Fluent
Dutch: Fluent
English: Fluent

Requirements

Good proficiency (understanding, writing, and speaking)




 Deep knowledge of generative AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Mistral, Llama, Microsoft Office CoPilot) and the underlying principles of large language models.

 Strong expertise in advanced prompt engineering, including prompt design, testing, and optimization for various tasks and domains.




Work Environment

 Expectation of 50% on-site and 50% remote work.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
💼Job Title: Machine Learning Engineer

👨‍💻Job Type: Freelance

📍Location: Brussels, Belgium

💼Work regime: Hybrid

🔥Keywords: Python, Git, Bash, data science, and SQL




Sector: Our client is a prominent player in the financial sector, recognized for its comprehensive range of banking and financial services. With a global presence, it serves a diverse clientele, including individuals, corporations, and institutions. Emphasizing innovation and customer-centricity, it leverages advanced technologies to deliver tailored solutions that meet the evolving needs of its stakeholders.




What you will do:

Manage the execution and quality assurance of the monthly production run from data preparation, scoring, and validation of different AI models and analytical indicators. Improve the automation of this process to make it more efficient

- Maintain and improve the existing Python programs for collecting and validating data from different sources, for building, scoring, and performance monitoring of AI models of the team (e.g. python version upgrades)

- Interface between data scientists and IT to support the usage of the Domino Data Science Platform, the AI building blocks, and the evolution of the Python environment.

- Assist data scientist by helping them identify and install the correct dependencies in their environment, best practices for code quality, continuous improvement and automation

- Support the creation of new variables (data engineering), automatic refit of the data science models

- Explore new ways of combining the available tools of the bank (AI building blocks from Tribe AI) to unlock new capabilities for building AI products and supporting the data scientists.

- Work with a team of motivated data scientists who are eager to learn, collaborate and share expertise.




What you bring:

You have at least 3 years of relevant experience.

Technical experience

Mandatory

Strong expertise in software development in Python and Python data science packages (pandas, sklearn)
Git
bash
SQL
Experience in MLOps / DevOps

preferable

SAS
Domino Data Science Platform
Django
software testing
experience in containerization (docker)
experience in Cloud environments




A little about us:

Innova Solutions is a diverse and award-winning global technology services partner. We provide our clients with strategic technology, talent, and business transformation solutions, enabling them to be leaders in their field.

Founded in 1998, headquartered in Atlanta (Duluth), Georgia.
Employs over 50,000 professionals worldwide, with annual revenue approaching $3.0B.
Delivers strategic technology and business transformation solutions globally.
Operates through global delivery centers across North America, Asia, and Europe.
Provides services for data center migration and workload development for cloud service providers.

Awardee of prestigious recognitions including:

Women’s Choice Awards - Best Companies to Work for Women & Millennials, 2024
Forbes, America’s Best Temporary Staffing and Best Professional Recruiting Firms, 2023
American Best in Business, Globee Awards, Healthcare Vulnerability Technology Solutions, 2023
Global Health & Pharma, Best Full Service Workforce Lifecycle Management Enterprise, 2023
Received 3 SBU Leadership in Business Awards
Stevie International Business Awards, Denials Remediation Healthcare Technology Solutions, 2023

Title: Data Scientist
Description:
ALTEN Belgium is a leading player in the fields of Engineering, Life Sciences and Information Technology, where people and innovation are at the heart of everything we do. In our open and dynamic organization, we empower our ambitious employees to unlock their full potential and thrive professionally.




We achieve this by offering them exciting projects and continuous development opportunities through the ALTEN Academy and our knowledge-sharing events. Our employees are part of a vast network of expertise, extending even internationally. This way, we foster individual growth while delivering cutting-edge solutions to our clients.




Context

In this role, you’ll help lead innovation in machine-learning techniques for driving and vehicle monitoring. You’ll be responsible for creating a machine-learning model that monitors and analyses time series data in real-time. As part of a dynamic, multidisciplinary team, you'll collaborate with researchers and engineers to integrate and optimize the model. If you’re a collaborative problem-solver with a strong background in time series and deep learning, and you're passionate about motorsport and automotive technology, this is the perfect opportunity for you to make an impact.




Expertise

Expertise in Machine Learning and Deep Learning, including familiarity with classical algorithms
Knowledge of foundation models, including large vision models and multi-modal models
Experience with time series analysis (experience with large real-time data is a plus)
(Preferred) Experience in developing, fine-tuning, and deploying deep neural networks in practical applications
(Preferred) Experience in integrating algorithms and conducting testing in real-world settings (e.g., embedded devices and cloud infrastructure)




Technical

Proficient in Python, with additional knowledge of C++ and MATLAB/Simulink
Strong expertise in PyTorch (experience with PyTorch Forecasting and TensorRT is a plus)
Familiarity with Python libraries such as Pandas and Scikit-learn (experience with SKTime and Darts is a bonus)
Skilled in Linux, Docker, and Git
Experienced in working with Linux environments and High-Performance Computing (HPC), preferably with AWS and Azure
(Optional) Experience with embedded architecture, specifically Nvidia Jetson




Tasks

Design, assess, and refine algorithms from the time series literature
Keep up-to-date with the latest developments in foundation models and time series analysis
Implement algorithms and manage the code repository
Work closely with researchers and engineers to train, test, and evaluate the model
Develop and support demonstrations with real systems and prepare for field tests
Present findings during regular project meetings and prepare results for publication




If you are interested, don't hesitate to apply!




Note: We are only hiring candidates authorized to work in Belgium without needing visa sponsorship now or in the future.

Show more

Title: Data Scientist Prompt Engineer
Description:
Mercier Consultancy is seeking a talented Data Scientist Prompt Engineer to join our dynamic team. As an integral part of our organization, you will leverage your expertise in data science and artificial intelligence to develop and refine prompt engineering techniques that enhance the functionality and performance of our data-driven solutions. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement innovative models that meet the diverse needs of our clients while pushing the boundaries of technology. Your role will be pivotal in transforming complex data into actionable insights, and your creative input will assist in driving strategic decision-making processes. With us, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects that impact various industries, from technology and finance to healthcare and beyond.

We are looking for an external consultant who can help us to use new generative AI tools like ChatGPT and Microsoft Office CoPilot to improve our employee productivity and efficiency in our standard activities. The consultant will work with different business users from different parts of the bank, such as marketing, sales, and back office, and with different profiles, such as managers, project managers, sales people, etc.

Responsibilities


Design and create the prompts that can elicit the best responses from the generative AI tools, using prompt engineering techniques and best practices
Understand the business needs: Identify the use cases, the business need and scenarios where our generative AI tools can add value and solve problems
Test and evaluate the quality and accuracy of the generative AI tools' outputs, using appropriate metrics and feedback mechanisms
Train and coach the business users on how to use the generative AI tools effectively and responsibly and begin to set in place a prompt academy
Document and communicate the results and learnings of the project



Requirements


Master's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or a related field
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or R
Experience with machine learning frameworks and prompt engineering techniques
Strong analytical and problem-solving capabilities
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to convey complex concepts to non-technical audiences
Knowledge of data visualization tools and methodologies
You have at least a Master's degree in a quantitative discipline, such as statistics, mathematics, engineering (a PhD is considered an advantage) or MBA
Candidates with other academic backgrounds with substantial knowledge of prompt engineering technics are also encouraged to apply
Fluent in Dutch, French and English
Team player
Quick self-starter, pro-active attitude
Good Communication and Influencing skills
Good analytical and synthesis skills
Autonomy, commitment and perseverance
Ability to work in a dynamic and multi-cultural environment
Thinks out of the box outside existing processes and frameworks
Works with energy and empowerment to deliver great results and a large contribution to the company's success
Constructive by being open to the changes and to other's opinions, ideas and feedback


Benefits

Competitive Monthly Salary

Working for a worldwide multinational

50% from home - 50% from location

And more....

As an integral part of our organization, you will leverage your expertise in data science and artificial intelligence to develop and refine prompt engineering techniques that enhance the functionality and performance of our data-driven solutions. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement innovative models that meet the diverse needs of our clients while pushing the boundaries of technology. Your role will be pivotal in transforming complex data into actionable insights, and your creative input will assist in driving strategic decision-making processes. With us, you will have the opportunity to work on exciting projects that impact various industries, from technology and finance to healthcare and beyond.

We are looking for an external consultant who can help us to use new generative AI tools like ChatGPT and Microsoft Office CoPilot to improve our employee productivity and efficiency in our standard activities. The consultant will work with different business users from different parts of the bank, such as marketing, sales, and back office, and with different profiles, such as managers, project managers, sales people, etc.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
NORRIQ is an international group based in Denmark and Belgium, comprising over 350 consultants dedicated to unlocking the full business potential of companies through technology and digital transformation.

We have a specialized Financial Services practice that is experiencing rapid growth. Over 100 consultants focus exclusively on the financial services sector, assisting banks and insurances in redesigning their operations to meet changing client expectations, adopt new technologies, and adhere to evolving regulations (DORA, RIS, AI Act, AML, KYC, etc).

At NORRIQ, our employees are at the heart of our organization and our success.. We hire and nurture passionate individuals who strive for excellence for both our clients and colleagues. Our culture supports personal and professional growth with training, opportunities, and creative freedom. Regardless of when you join or how long you stay, you'll experience an unforgettable NORRIQ journey and become a part of our extended family. Connected forever!

Role Overview

As an MLOps Engineer/AI Engineer, you will play a critical role in bridging the gap between Data Science and IT operations. Your primary responsibility will be to deploy, monitor, and optimize machine learning models and AI applications, ensuring seamless integration into the organization’s infrastructure. You will also contribute to lifecycle management, scalability, and performance optimization of AI systems.

Key Responsibilities


Model Deployment: Collaborate with Data Scientists to deploy optimized models for production, ensuring adherence to best practices for security, scalability, and reliability.
Data Pipeline Management: Design and implement automated and efficient data pipelines to support continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD).
Environment Setup: Assist teams in setting up projects by managing dependencies, configuring environments, and integrating tooling for code quality, testing, and deployment.
Data Flow Design: Establish and maintain seamless data flows between sources such as Cloud Storage, SQL databases, and other platforms to support AI applications.
Lifecycle Management: Oversee the lifecycle of AI applications, including performance monitoring, regular updates, incident management, and troubleshooting.
Kubernetes Orchestration: Use Kubernetes to manage and streamline the deployment of containerized components, ensuring efficient resource utilization and system reliability.
Incident Management: Promptly handle incidents, troubleshoot issues, and communicate updates to stakeholders while conducting root-cause analyses and post-mortems.
Innovation and Optimization: Explore innovative solutions to enhance AI capabilities and streamline model integration processes.


Requirements

Education


Master’s degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Substantial knowledge in Programming, System Engineering, or DevOps is highly valued.


Technical Expertise


Strong proficiency in Python.
Hands-on experience with REST APIs and Git version control.
Proven expertise in MLOps/DevOps, including CI/CD pipeline automation.
Familiarity with containerization tools (e.g., Docker) and orchestration systems (e.g., Kubernetes).
Knowledge of software testing practices and Linux operating systems.
Nice to have : SQL, PostgreSQL, Mlflow, Helm charts.


Soft Skills


Collaborative and team-oriented mindset.
Proactive, results-driven, and adaptable in a dynamic environment.
Strong communication, analytical, and problem-solving skills.


Language Proficiency


Fluent in English (spoken and written).
Additional knowledge of other languages is a plus.


Why Joining Us?


You will be part of a fast growing international company with a unique people culture
A very competitive salary package including a company car, iPhone and different allowances
You will get extensive trainings in Belgium and Denmark on technical matters, as well as soft skills and project management, and you will have access to new technologies and innovative equipment.
You will join a dynamic and growing team with a great mix of young and experienced professionals focusing on financial services.
Show more

Title: Expert in AI/NLP/ML (SNS01115)
Description:
Job Description

DESCRIPTION OF THE TASKS


Development and maintenance of software applications in the field of Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML) and/or Artificial Intelligence (AI)
Design and optimize machine learning systems and deep learning architectures
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI/ML solutions into existing products or processes
Design the IT architecture for solitons in the NLP / ML / AI fields, and coordinate its implementation considering master- and meta-data management concepts Conduct data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation
Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI/ML technologies and algorithms Maintain AI deployed solutions on SaaS platforms (AWS, Azure)
Document architecture blueprints and discuss business requirements
The candidate will report to the Architect Office as well as to the different project managers for the projects in which she/he will engage. The Architecture Office applies the SAFe methodology and work activities get assigned as part of the sprint planning.


LEVEL OF EDUCATION


Level of education corresponding to Level 7 of the European Qualification Framework which
typically corresponds to a master’s level or 5 years of higher education.


Knowledge And Skills


Ability to perform proof of concepts (PoC) efficiently and fast
Ability to give business and technical presentations
Ability to apply high quality standards
Ability to cope with fast changing technologies used in cloud-based environments
Very good communication skills with technical and non-technical audiences
Analysis and problem solving skills
Capability to write clear and structured technical documents
Ability to participate in technical meetings and good communication skills.


LANGUAGES


English
French


SPECIFIC EXPERTISE


Very good knowledge of Large Language Models (LLMs), Text embeddings, Tokenization and
Vectorization, Machine and Deep Learning
Very good knowledge and understanding of Python/Java/Containers (Docker/Kubernetes)/Cloud AI
services (AWS, Azure)
Good knowledge of natural language processing systems lifecycle and agile software
development methodologies
Good knowledge of quality assurance and quality control for machine translation (MT) and
experience with MT quality procedures, testing methodologies and tools, such as automatic
quality metrics (BLEU scores and similar) and human evaluation of MT quality


CERTIFICATIONS & STANDARDS


AWS Certified Machine Learning / Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate
AWS Certified Data Analytics / Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
AWS Certified Solutions Architect / Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutionms Architect Expert.


Hiring Team Member

Avula Srivalli

Recruitment Coordinator

Mail

Title: Artificial Intelligence Expert (AI/NLP/ML)
Description:
📢 We are looking for an Artificial Intelligence Expert (AI/NLP/ML)!

We are seeking a highly skilled Artificial Intelligence Expert specializing in Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML), and AI-driven solutions using Large Language Models (LLMs) for HR and Document Management applications. This role is part of the Architect Office (AO), which oversees and coordinates technical and business architecture-related activities. The position is remote, based in Europe (far-site).

📍 Location: Europe (Remote – Far-site)

📆 Start Date: Immediate

💼 Experience: Expertise in AI/ML/NLP solutions and cloud-based architectures

What Will You Do?

✅ Develop and maintain AI-powered software applications in Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML), and Artificial Intelligence (AI).

✅ Design and optimize machine learning systems and deep learning architectures.

✅ Integrate AI/ML solutions into existing products and processes in collaboration with cross-functional teams.

✅ Architect and implement AI solutions, ensuring compliance with master- and meta-data management principles.

✅ Conduct data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation to enhance AI performance.

✅ Stay up-to-date with AI/ML advancements, adopting state-of-the-art algorithms and technologies.

✅ Manage and maintain AI solutions deployed on SaaS platforms (AWS, Azure).

✅ Document architectural blueprints and align business requirements with AI-driven capabilities.

The candidate will report to the Architect Office (AO) and project managers, following SAFe methodology and sprint-based planning.

Requirements:

Requirements & Skills:

✨ Proven ability to develop Large Language Models (LLMs), text embeddings, tokenization, and vectorization.

✨ Strong expertise in Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning architectures.

✨ Hands-on experience with Python, Java, Containers (Docker/Kubernetes), and Cloud AI services (AWS, Azure).

✨ Deep understanding of NLP systems lifecycle and agile software development methodologies.

✨ Knowledge of quality assurance and control for machine translation (MT), including testing methodologies and evaluation metrics (BLEU scores and similar).

✨ Strong problem-solving, analytical, and technical writing skills.

✨ Ability to conduct proof of concepts (PoC) efficiently and effectively.

✨ Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present to both technical and non-technical audiences.

Preferred Qualifications & Certifications:

✅ AWS Certified Machine Learning / Microsoft Certified: Azure AI Engineer Associate.

✅ AWS Certified Data Analytics / Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate.

✅ AWS Certified Solutions Architect / Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert.

Additional Requirements for Large International Organizations:

🌍 Ability to integrate into an international, multicultural environment and work in multilingual settings.

🤝 Strong team player with experience working on large-scale projects.

📝 High degree of discretion and integrity, as the managed applications contain confidential and personal data.

🗣 Fluent English (C1/C2) is mandatory; French (B1/B2) is an advantage.

Why Join Us?

🚀 Work on cutting-edge AI/NLP/ML solutions in a highly innovative and technical environment.

🌍 Remote opportunity within a highly collaborative and multicultural team.

💡 Be part of an international transformation program, driving AI-powered solutions for HR and Document Management.

💼 Competitive salary, career growth opportunities, and involvement in AI-driven digital transformation projects.

📩 Apply now or send your resume to jobs@sapindex.es and be part of the AI revolution! 🚀

Title: Data Scientist
Company: Nuitée | Enabling all companies to build travel solutions
Description:
About the company

Founded in 2017, Nuitée makes it easy for businesses to build travel applications securely and quickly, accelerating your revenue growth. We're committed to enhancing the travel planning process and ensuring our technology meets the dynamic needs of our users.

Nuitee is headquartered in Ireland with a tech and operations hub in Casablanca, Morocco and Palma de Mallorca, Spain. Commercial staff are based around the world in the USA, Mexico, Spain, Germany and Argentina.




About the Role:

We are seeking a talented and motivated Data Scientist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in machine learning, data analysis, and reporting, with experience in travel tech or related domains. You will work on cutting-edge projects involving search optimization, NLP systems, and various machine learning models.




Key Responsibilities:

Develop and implement machine learning models using XGBoost and other classical ML algorithms
Design and maintain data pipelines using Metaflow for efficient model training and deployment
Conduct in-depth data analysis and create comprehensive reports using BigQuery
Contribute to the development of NLP systems and language models
Optimize search algorithms and recommendation systems
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve complex business problems
Stay current with the latest advancements in data science and machine learning




Our Ideal Candidate:

Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field
2-4 years of professional experience as a Data Scientist
Strong proficiency in Python and SQL
Extensive experience with data analysis and visualization tools
Proven track record of developing and deploying machine learning models in production environments
Experience with XGBoost and other classical machine learning algorithms
Familiarity with BigQuery for large-scale data analysis and reporting
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication skills and ability to present complex findings to non-technical stakeholders




Nice to have:

Experience in the travel tech industry
Hands-on experience with Metaflow for managing data science workflows
Knowledge of NLP techniques and language models
Experience with search optimization and recommendation systems
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure)
Contributions to open-source projects or research publications in relevant fields







Why Nuitee?

At Nuitee, you’ll be part of an innovative team that thrives on pushing boundaries and defining the future of travel technology. We offer the flexibility of remote work and the opportunity to make significant impacts on a global scale, enhancing the travel experiences for millions of users. Join us and help drive the continuous evolution of our cutting-edge platform.




Be part of a company on the way to becoming the world's leading technology platform for travel.

We're seeking individuals who are eager to embark on this exhilarating journey. Grab the chance to join us and send your application today!
